entries.title: Bill C-11 Raising Serious Doubts About CRTC’s Independence From Feds
entries.description: Minister of Canadian Heritage Pablo Rodriguez prepares to appear before the Senate Committee on Transport and Communications on Bill C-11, in the Senate of Canada Building in Ottawa on Nov. 22, 2022. (The Canadian Press/Justin Tang)

entries.title: Elon Musk Says ‘Coalition of Political Groups’ Behind Lack of Moderation Council
entries.description: Elon Musk's Twitter profile on a smartphone placed on printed Twitter logos, on April 28, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)
